remarks: A function on the elements of an internal direct product has pairwise-commuting values.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ dprdfcntz as of 11-Jul-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
dprdffOLD.w $e |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | ( `' h " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin } $.
dprdffOLD.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dprdffOLD.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dprdffOLD.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. W ) $.
dprdfcntzOLD.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
dprdfcntzOLD $p |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
$d .0. h $.
$d F h $.
$d I h i $.
$d S h i $.
